item.title: 美国为何允许乌克兰用美国导弹打击俄罗斯境内
item.description: 几个月来，乌克兰一直在恳求美国允许其使用美制武器打击边境地区以外俄罗斯境内的军事目标。现在，据熟悉这一决定的人士称，在乔-拜登即将结束总统任期之际，他终于松口，决定取消一些限制。【原文：Ukraine has been pleading with the US for months to let it use American-made weapons to hit military targets inside Russia beyond the border zone. Now, as he nears the end of his presidency, Joe Biden has relented and decided to lift some restrictions, according to people familiar with the decision.】

item.title: 中国市场需求骤降，瑞士钟表出口再度下滑
item.description: 10 月份，瑞士钟表出口连续第二个月下降，原因是对中国出口的大幅下降抵消了对美国出口的增长。【原文：Swiss watch exports fell for a second straight month in October as a sharp drop in shipments to China offset growth in the US.】

item.title: 旅游业蓬勃发展，泰国酒店集团计划推出房地产投资信托基金，将 70 亿美元负债减半
item.description: 亚洲最大的酒店集团之一 Minor International Pcl 计划明年通过发行房地产投资信托基金，将其 70 多亿美元的负债减半，同时押注旅游业的强劲复苏将推动利润实现两位数增长。【原文：Minor International Pcl, one of Asia’s largest hospitality groups, plans to halve its more than $7 billion liabilities by floating a real-estate investment trust next year, while betting on a strong recovery in tourism to drive a double-digit growth in profit.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市有望连续第二天反弹
印尼可能恢复税收特赦以增加收入、扩大税基
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的政府正在想方设法增加国家收入和扩大税收基础，印尼将在明年讨论恢复税收特赦计划。【原文：Indonesia will discuss reviving its tax amnesty program next year as President Prabowo Subianto’s government seeks ways to boost state revenue and broaden the tax base.】

item.title: 拉吉夫-米斯拉（Rajeev Misra）的 OneIM 将规模扩大至 80 亿美元，以促进投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由软银愿景基金（SoftBank Vision Fund）前联合首席执行官拉吉夫-米斯拉（Rajeev Misra）设立的 One Investment Management 基金本月已将规模扩大了 10 亿多美元，以支持其在日本和印度等国开设办事处后不断增长的业务。【原文：One Investment Management, a fund set up by SoftBank Vision Fund’s former co-chief executive officer Rajeev Misra, has upped its size by more than $1 billion this month to support its growing operations as it opens offices in countries such as Japan and India, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 雀巢公司首席执行官将增加营销支出，降低利润率目标
item.description: 雀巢公司（Nestle SA）新任首席执行官洛朗-弗莱克西（Laurent Freixe）计划增加营销支出，以恢复购物者对公司高价品牌的消费欲望。此举将意味着中期盈利能力下降。【原文：Nestle SA’s new Chief Executive Officer Laurent Freixe plans to increase marketing spending to restore shoppers’ appetite for the company’s pricier brands. The move will mean lower profitability for the medium term.】

item.title: 台湾银行因担心诈骗而减少 Facebook 广告投放
item.description: 由于担心在 Meta Platforms 公司的 Facebook 上金融诈骗猖獗，台湾各大银行正在暂停在该网站上投放广告。【原文：Major Taiwanese banks are suspending their advertising on Meta Platforms Inc.’s Facebook due to concerns over rampant financial scams on the site.】

item.title: 路透社称索尼正在洽谈收购日本角川出版社
item.description: 路透社援引两位不愿透露姓名的知情人士的话报道，索尼集团公司正在讨论收购日本内容出版商角川公司。【原文：Sony Group Corp. is in discussions to acquire Japanese content publisher Kadokawa Corp., Reuters reported, citing two unidentified people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯过渡年出现负现金流
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯股份公司（Thyssenkrupp AG）预计本财年将因重组和投资成本上升而出现现金亏损，这凸显了在德国工业经济萎靡不振的情况下对该企业集团进行全面改革的难度。【原文：Thyssenkrupp AG expects to post cash losses this fiscal year on rising restructuring and investment costs, highlighting the difficulty of overhauling the conglomerate as Germany’s industrial economy sputters.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜令欧洲投资者雪上加霜
item.description:
自美国大选以来，欧洲股市和欧元全线下滑，因为投资者押注特朗普的政策将重创欧洲大陆。【原文：

European stocks and the euro have all slumped since the US election as investors bet Trump’s policies will hit the continent hard.

】

item.title: 日本自民党任命前大臣山木和为芯片沙皇
item.description: 日本执政党任命山木和大四郎（Daishiro Yamagiwa）为其促进半导体发展小组的新任主席，以建立一个新的机制来增加对这一关键产业的资金投入。【原文：Japan’s ruling party named Daishiro Yamagiwa as the new chairman of its group that promotes semiconductors, as it sets up a new mechanism to boost funding for the key industry.】

item.title: Talabat 15 亿美元迪拜首次公开募股开盘后不久即告售罄
item.description: Delivery Hero SE 的中东业务部门在迪拜首次公开发行的 15 亿美元股票在认购开始后几分钟就被抢购一空，这是地区性交易需求旺盛的最新迹象。【原文：Delivery Hero SE’s Middle East unit had demand for all shares in its $1.5 billion Dubai initial public offering minutes after subscriptions opened, in the latest sign of robust demand for regional deals.】

item.title: 随着紧张局势缓和，中国寻求恢复与印度的直飞航班
item.description: 中国外交部长王毅表示，中国希望恢复与印度的直航，因为这两个亚洲邻国之间的紧张局势在长达四年的边界争端僵局之后有所缓和。【原文：Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said the country wants to restore direct flights with India, as tensions between the two Asian neighbors dial down following a four-year impasse on border disputes.】

item.title: 三星派发 18 亿美元股息，韩元面临更大挑战
item.description: 今年大部分时间都承压的韩元面临着一个新的障碍：三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.【原文：The South Korean won, under pressure for most of the year, faces an emerging obstacle: dividend payouts from Samsung Electronics Co.】

item.title: 当您在投票时，美国公司赚了大钱
item.description:
财报季显示，第三季度业绩并未因大选前的紧张情绪而放缓。【原文：

Earnings season shows that third-quarter performance didn’t slow down on pre-election jitters.

】

item.title: 中国要求地方基金停止通过香港联系购买 LGFV 债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国实际上已禁止国内投资者通过与香港的交易联系购买地方政府融资工具发行的离岸人民币债券，这是中国为控制债务缠身的地方政府融资工具风险而采取的最新举措。【原文：China has effectively banned domestic investors from buying offshore yuan bonds issued by local government financing vehicles through its trading link with Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter, in the latest move to contain risks from the debt-laden sector.】

item.title: 人工智能伴侣时代的爱情
item.description:
在彭博社原创系列Posthuman的这一集中，我们将探讨机器人是否有助于缓解孤独感的流行—或使其更加严重。【原文：

On this episode of the Bloomberg Originals series Posthuman, we explore whether bots will help ease the loneliness epidemic—or make it worse.

】

item.title: 瑞典 4000 亿美元养老金调整威胁小型基金
item.description: 瑞典规模较小的资产管理公司面临着达尔文式的生存斗争，因为在瑞典 4000 亿美元的养老金行业发生欺诈丑闻后，瑞典进行了重大改革，削减了储蓄者可选择的基金数量。【原文：Sweden’s smaller asset managers face a Darwinian struggle for survival as major reforms slash the number of funds that savers can choose after a fraud scandal rocked the country’s $400 billion pension industry.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选后，非洲各国央行将趁机削减开支
item.description: 在未来三周内权衡利弊的大多数非洲国家央行都将降低利率，因为他们担心唐纳德-特朗普就任美国总统后，进一步放宽利率的窗口可能会缩小。【原文：Most African central banks weighing interest rates over the next three weeks are set to lower them, wary that the window to ease further may narrow after Donald Trump becomes US president.】

item.title: 匈牙利将维持关键利率，重点放在指导上：决策指南
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选引发新兴市场货币最大幅度下跌之后，匈牙利准备连续第二个月维持关键利率不变，以支持福林。【原文：Hungary is poised to hold its key interest rate for a second month to support the forint after Donald Trump’s election win triggered one of the steepest currency declines in emerging markets.】

item.title: 受出口税调整和美元走软影响，铝业重拾涨势
item.description: 由于担心中国取消出口退税后全球供应将收紧，铝恢复了涨势，而美元走软也支撑了整个金属板块。【原文：Aluminum resumed gains on concerns global supplies would tighten following China’s removal of an export tax rebate, while a weakening dollar also supported metals across the board.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选后，越南纺织集团寻求市场多元化
item.description: 越南服装业明年将继续增长，但在等待美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普在关税问题上采取何种措施的同时，越南正寻求使其主要出口市场多样化。【原文：Vietnam’s garment industry is set for continued growth next year but is looking to diversify its key export markets as it waits to see what steps US President-elect Donald Trump will take when it comes to tariffs.】

item.title: 吉宝 DC REIT 以 10 亿新元收购云顶里数据中心
item.description: 吉宝 DC REIT 同意收购新加坡云顶里的两座数据中心大楼，交易资产估值约为 10 亿新元（7.47 亿美元）。【原文：Keppel DC REIT agreed to acquire two data center buildings in Singapore’s Genting Lane in a deal valuing the assets at about S$1 billion ($747 million).】

item.title: 摩根士丹利和高盛呼吁提高大中华区透明度
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的高层呼吁中国提高透明度，放宽资本流动，以恢复全球投资者的胃口。【原文：The top bosses from Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Morgan Stanley called for greater transparency from China and for eased movement of capital to restore the appetite of global investors.】

item.title: 牛肉饭价格上涨带动日本 Zensho 公司股价上涨
item.description: 日本快餐店运营商 Zensho Holdings Co. 的股价因其计划提高牛肉饭连锁店 Sukiya 的价格而跳涨。摩根士丹利 MUFG 证券公司（Morgan Stanley MUFG Securities Co.【原文：Shares of Japanese fast-food restaurant operator Zensho Holdings Co. jumped on its plans to raise prices at beef bowl chain Sukiya. A target price increase by Morgan Stanley MUFG Securities Co. also helped boost the stock.】

item.title: BCG称尽管实施经济刺激政策，中国消费者仍持谨慎态度
item.description: 波士顿咨询公司（Boston Consulting Group）表示，由于政府近期采取的刺激措施尚未对中国消费者动摇的信心产生实质性的提振作用，中国消费者在消费方面仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Chinese consumers remain cautious on spending as the government’s recent stimulus measures haven’t yet yielded a substantive boost to their shaken confidence, Boston Consulting Group said.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选后菲律宾央行释放宽松信号
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）周二表示，尽管唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的胜选给全球经济和政策利率路径带来了不确定性，但菲律宾央行仍将继续降息。【原文：The Philippine central bank is on course for more rate cuts, Governor Eli Remolona said Tuesday, even as Donald Trump’s win has cast uncertainty over the global economy and policy rate path.】

item.title: 韩国上季度家庭债务增幅为 2021 年以来最大
item.description: 韩国上一季度的家庭债务增长为三年来之最，这突显了央行直到上个月才开始调整政策的一个事态发展。【原文：South Korea’s household debt grew the most in three years last quarter, highlighting a development that kept the central bank from pivoting on policy until last month.】

item.title: 日本和中国在特朗普赢得大选前抛售美国国债
item.description: 随着美国总统大选前的反弹，全球最大的两家美国国债外国持有者在第三季度抛售了大量国债。【原文：Two of the world’s biggest foreign holders of US government debt offloaded a pile of Treasuries in the third quarter as they rallied before the presidential election.】
